message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $17,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
